TopicTitle: I have mad a KSP Planet mod and i need to change the space center location as it is in a mountain. is there any quick move way to do this/

Articles.Content: All i need to do is move the space center as i have made a new homeworld for my kerbals and i need the space center out of a mountain. I can change it in the config file but i was wondering if there ws any quick way or tools that can do this for me? Thanks

https://github.com/KSP-RO/KSCSwitcher

That might work...

That version is supposed to be good up to KSP v1.4.3....might work with v1.4.5.
